src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide
[Java] Class ViewDrugActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.app.Activity
      src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.CommonActivity
          src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.LoggedInActivity
              src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.ViewDrugActivity

public class ViewDrugActivity
extends LoggedInActivity

This class is an activity for displaying a drug and all its information. If a drug has a calculator, this will also allow the user to navigate to the calculator for that drug.

Authors:
Aidan Wynne Fewster
Version:
1.0
Since:
1.0
